item.title: About The Mythical Man Month Blog
item.description: Almost 15 years ago I started a blog call FourM. The name of the blog was based on an article I wrote where I give a brief historical survey of software development methods, culminating in agile methods. Even though the article is 15 years old, it still has many interesting things to say. Knowing that you likely are not going to read it, here is a quote from the introduction which summarizes my thinking on our craft:
